short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search on Google from Any Location (Zip Code, City Name)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This google chrome extension let users to search from different locations by entering a zip code or city name. It helps you in checking the ranking of paid ads and organic results from other locations.

How to use?
1) Click on the extension icon.
2) Enter your keyword, zip code or city name, number of results you want 10 to 100, country short code, language short code and google tld of the country.
3) A new chrome tab will open with localized results.
